ayah: إِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ قَالُواْ نَشۡهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
ayah_translit: idha jaaka al-munafiquna qalu nashhadu innaka larasulu al-lahi wal-lahu ya'lamu innaka larasuluhu wal-lahu yashhadu inna al-munafiqina lakadhibuna
ayah_english: When come to you the hypocrites they say We testify that you (are) surely (the) Messenger (of) Allah And Allah knows that you (are) surely His Messenger and Allah testifies that the hypocrites (are) surely liars

ayah: إِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ قَالُواْ نَشۡهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

ayah: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fasaddu an sabili al-lahi innahum saa ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: They take their oaths (as) a cover so they turn away from (the) Way (of) Allah Indeed evil is what they used (to) do

ayah_translit: ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fasaddu an sabili al-lahi innahum saa ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: They take their oaths (as) a cover so they turn away from (the) Way (of) Allah Indeed evil is what they used (to) do

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ ثُمَّ كَفَرُواْ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum amanu thumma kafaru fatubi'a ala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
ayah_english: That (is) because they believed then they disbelieved; so were sealed [upon] their hearts so they (do) not understand

ayah: ۞وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ تُعۡجِبُكَ أَجۡسَامُهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَقُولُواْ تَسۡمَعۡ لِقَوۡلِهِمۡۖ كَأَنَّهُمۡ خُشُبٞ مُّسَنَّدَةٞۖ يَحۡسَبُونَ كُلَّ صَيۡحَةٍ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ هُمُ ٱلۡعَدُوُّ فَٱحۡذَرۡهُمۡۚ قَٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ أَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-aytahum tu'jibuka ajsamuhum wa-in yaqulu tasma' liqawlihim ka-annahum khushubun musannadatun yahsabuna kulla sayhatin alayhim humu al-'aduwu fa-ih'dharhum qatalahumu al-lahu anna yu'fakuna
ayah_english: And when you see them pleases you their bodies and if they speak you listen to their speech as if they (were) pieces of wood propped up They think every shout (is) against them They (are) the enemy so beware of them May destroy them Allah How are they deluded

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡاْ يَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ لَوَّوۡاْ رُءُوسَهُمۡ وَرَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ وَهُم مُّسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw yastaghfir lakum rasulu al-lahi lawwaw ruusahum wara-aytahum yasudduna wahum mus'takbiruna
ayah_english: And when it is said to them Come will ask forgiveness for you (the) Messenger (of) Allah They turn aside their heads and you see them turning away while they (are) arrogant

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡاْ يَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ لَوَّوۡاْ رُءُوسَهُمۡ وَرَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ وَهُم مُّسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw yastaghfir lakum rasulu al-lahi lawwaw ruusahum wara-aytahum yasudduna wahum mus'takbiruna
ayah_english: And when it is said to them Come will ask forgiveness for you (the) Messenger (of) Allah They turn aside their heads and you see them turning away while they (are) arrogant

ayah: سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَسۡتَغۡفَرۡتَ لَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ لَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: sawaon alayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira al-lahu lahum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
ayah_english: (It) is same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or (do) not ask forgiveness for them Never will forgive Allah [to] them Indeed Allah (does) not guide the people the defiantly disobedient

ayah: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ
ayah_translit: humu alladhina yaquluna la tunfiqu ala man inda rasuli al-lahi hatta yanfaddu walillahi khazainu al-samawati wal-ardi walakinna al-munafiqina la yafqahuna
ayah_english: They (are) those who say (Do) not spend on (those) who (are) with (the) Messenger (of) Allah until they disband And for Allah (are the) treasures (of) the heavens and the earth but the hypocrites (do) not understand

ayah: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

ayah: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

ayah_english: They (are) those who say (Do) not spend on (those) who (are) with (the) Messenger (of) Allah until they disband And for Allah (are the) treasures (of) the heavens and the earth but the hypocrites (do) not understand

ayah: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَنَّ ٱلۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡأَذَلَّۚ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaquluna la-in raja'na ila al-madinati layukh'rijanna al-a'azu min'ha al-adhala walillahi al-'izatu walirasulihi walil'mu'minina walakinna al-munafiqina la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: They say If we return to Al-Madinah surely will expel the more honorable from it the more humble But for Allah (is) the honor and for His Messenger and for the believers but the hypocrites (do) not know

ayah: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَنَّ ٱلۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡأَذَلَّۚ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَنَّ ٱلۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡأَذَلَّۚ وَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُلۡهِكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tul'hikum amwalukum wala awladukum an dhik'ri al-lahi waman yaf 'al dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: O you (who) believe (Let) not divert you your wealth and not your children from (the) remembrance (of) Allah And whoever does that then those [they] (are) the losers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُلۡهِكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tul'hikum amwalukum wala awladukum an dhik'ri al-lahi waman yaf 'al dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: O you (who) believe (Let) not divert you your wealth and not your children from (the) remembrance (of) Allah And whoever does that then those [they] (are) the losers

ayah: وَأَنفِقُواْ مِن مَّا رَزَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوۡلَآ أَخَّرۡتَنِيٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ قَرِيبٖ فَأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-anfiqu min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu al-mawtu fayaqula rabbi lawla akhartani ila ajalin qaribin fa-assaddaqa wa-akun mina al-salihina
ayah_english: And spend from what We have provided you from before [that] comes (to) one of you the death and he says My Lord Why not You delay me for a term near so I would give charity and be among the righteous

ayah: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idha jaa ajaluha wal-lahu khabirun bima ta'maluna
ayah_english: But never will (be) delayed (by) Allah a soul when has come its term And Allah (is) All-Aware of what you do

ayah_english: But never will (be) delayed (by) Allah a soul when has come its term And Allah (is) All-Aware of what you do

ayah: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
